entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
